## Perlin.setSeed() method

Set the random seed

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSeed(value: number): void;
```

</th><th>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

Once the seed changes, the internal random number hash table will be shuffled immediately.
